title: Episode 33: Addiction (Dr. Dennis Lorenz)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, Dr. Dennis Lorenz of the UW-Green Bay Psychology program discusses the biological basis of addiction, including the more recently recognized behavioral addictions to things like gambling, internet, sex, and more.

description: In this episode, Dr. Dennis Lorenz of the UW-Green Bay Psychology program discusses the biological basis of addiction, including the more recently recognized behavioral addictions to things like gambling, internet, sex, and more.
